channel.title: NPC spawning error? and other stuff? >->
channel.description:
[b]I seem to get this error when trying to run.bat when I try to spawn an npc... any clue why?[/b]
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3298 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3189) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:63) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[b]I'll post a picture of my spawn.cfg and I'll circle what NPC I added.[/b]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/295sc3a.jpg[/img]
[b]Also since I'm basing my server off of pk and Economy, I need help with this. When I trade people, it tells the price of items at the bottom of trade. Can anyone tell/show me how to remove this?[/b]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34nqflk.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Edit:[/u] My source + client is 317 loading 525[/b]

item.title: NPC spawning error? and other stuff? >->
item.dc:creator: @chains424 chains424
item.description:
@chains424 wrote:

I seem to get this error when trying to run.bat when I try to spawn an npc… any clue why?

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3298 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:3189) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:63) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Press any key to continue . . .

I’ll post a picture of my spawn.cfg and I’ll circle what NPC I added.

295sc3a.jpg670×596

Also since I’m basing my server off of pk and Economy, I need help with this. When I trade people, it tells the price of items at the bottom of trade. Can anyone tell/show me how to remove this?

Edit: My source + client is 317 loading 525

Read full topic
item.source: NPC spawning error? and other stuff? >->
